casebody.data:
THOMAS K. BARBER v. ROBERT D. JACOBS ET AL. ROBERT D. JACOBS ET AL v. THE PUTNAM TRUST COMPANY OF GREENWICH ET AL. Scott M. Harrington, in support of the petition. *921John F. Lambert, in opposition. Decided October 2, 2000

SULLIVAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
